item.title: Single vs double quotes in ruby
item.description: Difference between using single-quotes and double-quotes

item.title: About
item.description: Hi I am software engineer based in central Europe on the journey for full stack mastery. On this site you can find my thoughts and observations mostly about programing. I am not fluent in english but I am trying to improve it by writing this page and reading books. My stack: ruby (+ rails) javascript css html docker postgres git My equipment: macbook air 2020 (M1) Keychron K2 (Hot-swappable) dell UltraSharp U2412M 24" audio-technica ATH-M50x I would like to thank open source community especially creators of hugo and this beautifle theme.
